value.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can't understand why any sane adult would enjoy My Little Pony, and tends to dislike anyone who does.\n\n{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss from equipping pony plushies, and has a strong dislike of pony xenotypes; {PAWN_pronoun} will detest it if {PAWN_pronoun} is turned into one.
